panels.description: Number of Datacenters monitored by selected Harvest instances. (Controlled by the Hostname variable).

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> group()
  |> unique(column: "datacenter")
  |> count(column: "datacenter")

panels.title: Datacenters

panels.description: Number of Pollers in selected Harvest instances. (Usually one poller monitors one cluster).

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> group()
  |> unique(column: "poller")
  |> count(column: "poller")

panels.title: Pollers

panels.description: Number of Collectors in selected Pollers. (Each Collector-Object pair is treated as a collector).

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_component" and r["type"] == "collector")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({unique_name: r.name + "_" + r.target}) )
  |> unique(column: "unique_name")
  |> count(column: "unique_name")

panels.title: Collectors

panels.description: Number of Exporters in selected Pollers.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_component" and r["type"] == "exporter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({unique_name: r.name + "_" + r.target}) )
  |> unique(column: "unique_name")
  |> count(column: "unique_name")
  |> yield(name: "count")

panels.title: Exporters

panels.description: Number of data points collected by Collectors each minute.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_component" and r["_field"] == "count" and r["type"] == "collector")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["name"], set: ${Collector:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["target"], set: ${Object:json}))
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Collected/1m

panels.description: Number of data points exported each minute.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_component" and r["_field"] == "count" and r["type"] == "exporter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["target"], set: ${Exporter:json}))  
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

panels.title: Exported/1m

panels.description: System CPU used by selected Harvest instances and Pollers. Number can be higher than 100% on multi-core systems.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller" and r["_field"] == "cpu_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> group() // summarize data of all pollers
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) // average over time

panels.title: CPU %

panels.description: System Memory used by selected Harvest instances and Pollers.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller" and r["_field"] == "memory_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Memory %

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller" and r["_field"] == "status_code")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> group(columns: ["poller", "hostname", "datacenter"], mode: "by")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with status: int(v: r._value) }) )

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_target")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "status_code" or r["_field"] == "ping")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> group(columns: ["poller", "hostname", "addr"], mode: "by")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with status_code: int(v: r._value) }) )

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_component" and r["_field"] == "status_code" and r["type"] == "collector")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["name"], set: ${Collector:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["target"], set: ${Object:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["poller", "name", "target"], mode: "by")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with status: int(v: r._value) }) )

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_component" and r["_field"] == "status_code" and r["type"] == "exporter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["target"], set: ${Exporter:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["poller", "name", "target"], mode: "by")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with status: int(v: r._value) }) )

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_target" and r["_field"] == "ping")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with unique_name: r.poller + " - " + r.addr}) )
  |> group(columns: ["unique_name"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: Average duration of data poll of all collectors

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_collector" and r["_field"] == "poll_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["poller"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Poll Time

panels.description: Average duration of data poll (includes API time and plugins)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_collector" and r["_field"] == "poll_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["collector"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Poll Time per Collector

panels.description: Average duration of export

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_exporter" and r["_field"] == "harvest_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["target"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Export Time

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller" and  r["_field"] == "cpu_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["poller"], mode:"by")
  |> keep(columns: ["poller", "_value", "_time"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "poller" and r._field == "memory_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["poller"], mode:"by")
  |> keep(columns: ["poller", "_value", "_time"])

panels.description: CPU time per minute of each Poller

targets.query:
import "experimental/aggregate"
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["_field"], set: ["cpu_iowait", "cpu_system", "cpu_user"]))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with display_name: r.poller + "- " + r._field}) )
  |> aggregate.rate(every: 10s, groupColumns: ["poller", "_field"], unit: 10s)

panels.title: CPU times: Breakdown

panels.description: Graph is useful when a single Poller is selected

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /memory_\w+/ and r["_field"] != "memory_percent" and r["_field"] != "memory_vms")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with display_name: r.poller + " - " + r._field}) )
  |> group(columns: ["display_name"], mode:"by")
  |> keep(columns: ["display_name", "_value", "_time"])

panels.title: Memory breakdown

targets.query:
import "experimental/aggregate"
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller" and contains(value: r["_field"], set: ["io_write_bytes", "io_read_bytes", "io_cancelled_write_bytes"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> aggregate.rate(every: 10s, groupColumns: ["poller", "_field"], unit: 10s)

import "experimental/aggregate"
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller" and contains(value: r["_field"], set: ["io_wchar", "io_rchar"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> aggregate.rate(every: 10s, groupColumns: ["poller", "_field"], unit: 10s)

import "experimental/aggregate"
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller" and contains(value: r["_field"], set: ["io_syscw", "io_syscr"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> aggregate.rate(every: 10s, groupColumns: ["poller", "_field"], unit: 10s)

import "experimental/aggregate"
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller" and contains(value: r["_field"], set: ["net_sent_bytes", "net_rcv_bytes"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> aggregate.rate(every: 10s, groupColumns: ["poller", "_field"], unit: 10s)

import "experimental/aggregate"
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller" and contains(value: r["_field"], set: ["net_sent_packets", "net_rcv_packets"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> aggregate.rate(every: 10s, groupColumns: ["poller", "_field"], unit: 10s)

import "experimental/aggregate"
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller" and contains(value: r["_field"], set: ["net_sent_errs", "net_rcv_errs"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> aggregate.rate(every: 10s, groupColumns: ["poller", "_field"], unit: 10s)

panels.description: File descriptors opened by Pollers

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller" and r["_field"] == "fds")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["poller"], mode:"by")
  |> keep(columns: ["poller", "_value", "_time"])

panels.title: FDs

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller" and r["_field"] == "threads")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))

panels.title: Threads

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_target" and r["_field"] == "goroutines")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))

panels.title: Goroutines

panels.description:
You can select here a Poller, Collector and Object, to narrow down the data.

Average duration of Data Poll. This includes API time (shown below).

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_collector" and r["_field"] == "poll_time" and r["task"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["collector"], set: ${Collector:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["object"], set: ${Object:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with display_name: r.collector + " - " + r.object}) )
  |> group(columns: ["display_name"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["display_name", "_value", "_time"])

panels.title: Data Poll Time

panels.description: Total number of data points collected

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_collector" and r["_field"] == "count" and r["task"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["collector"], set: ${Collector:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["object"], set: ${Object:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with display_name: r.collector + " - " + r.object}) )
  |> group(columns: ["display_name"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["display_name", "_value", "_time"])

panels.title: Data Points

panels.description: Total number of instances

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_collector" and r["_field"] == "count" and r["task"] == "instance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["collector"], set: ${Collector:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["object"], set: ${Object:json}))

  |> keep(columns: ["display_name", "_value", "_time"])

panels.title: Instances

panels.description: Average API wait time of each data poll

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_collector" and r["_field"] == "api_time" and r["task"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["collector"], set: ${Collector:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["object"], set: ${Object:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with display_name: r.collector + " - " + r.object}) )
  |> group(columns: ["display_name"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["display_name", "_value", "_time"])

panels.title: API Time

panels.description: Average time it takes to Parse the XML load. Reported by Collectors that deal with XML data (Zapi and ZapiPerf).

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_collector" and r["_field"] == "parse_time" and r["task"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["collector"], set: ${Collector:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["object"], set: ${Object:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["collector", "object"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: XML Parse Time

panels.description: Average time to do delta-calculation on collected data points. This metric is reported by the ZapiPerf collector.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_collector" and r["_field"] == "calc_time" and r["task"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["collector"], set: ${Collector:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["object"], set: ${Object:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["collector", "object"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Postprocessing Time

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller")
  |> keep(columns: ["hostname"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "hostname")
list.name: Hostname
list.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller")
  |> keep(columns: ["hostname"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "hostname")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["hostname"], set: [${Hostname:json}]))
  |> keep(columns: ["poller"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "poller")
list.name: Poller
list.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "poller")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["hostname"], set: [${Hostname:json}]))
  |> keep(columns: ["poller"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "poller")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_component"and r["type"] == "collector")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> keep(columns: ["name"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "name")
list.name: Collector
list.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_component"and r["type"] == "collector")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> keep(columns: ["name"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "name")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_component" and r["type"] == "collector")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["name"], set: ${Collector:json}))
  |> keep(columns: ["target"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "target")
list.name: Object
list.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_component" and r["type"] == "collector")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["name"], set: ${Collector:json}))
  |> keep(columns: ["target"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "target")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_component" and r["type"] == "exporter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> keep(columns: ["target"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "target")
list.name: Exporter
list.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata_component" and r["type"] == "exporter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["poller"], set: ${Poller:json}))
  |> keep(columns: ["target"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "target")
